Posts.Content: Jan 16, 2013 04:42PM Nancy681 wrote: Hello, I am 68, had lumpectomy, jan2nd. Right now there were no lymph nodes affected, but am waiting for the second biopsy. I have been doing very well. Waiting for surgery to heal and will start radiation later. Just started to take Arimidex My questions are about the side effects of Arimidex and effects from radiation. My prayers and good wishes go out to all of you. We all will survive and have happy lives. God bless
Posts.Title: January 2013 surgery JRMH Lbwagner69
